shadowverse:GeassRelic.NAME: Geass: Survive
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, whenever you would die, heal 1 HP, remove all of your debuffs, gain #b5 #yStrength and #yDexterity, and gain #b25 #yBlock.

shadowverse:Bullet.NAME: Mystical Bullet
shadowverse:Bullet.FLAVOR: Think of it as a good luck charm. Do try to keep it close.
DESCRIPTIONS: The world of Rivayle sprang forth from this crucible known as the Lodestone.

At the start of the 1st, 3rd turn, add 1 #yVerdict #yRendered to hand. NL At the start of the 2nd, 4th turn, add 1 #yAbsolute #yDecree to hand. NL At the start of the 5th turn or after, add 1 that you don't have in hand.

shadowverse:ValhoreanDealer.NAME: Valhorean Dealer
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to spend #b30 gold to redraw any number of cards in your hand.
